scripts.install: pnpm download && pnpm bindVersion && pnpm imp
scripts.bindVersion:
rm src/runtime/config/version.txt && echo -n $(gluon ff-version | tr -d '
') > src/runtime/config/version.txt && rm src/runtime/config/version_display.txt && echo -n $(gluon ff-version | tr -d '
') > src/runtime/config/version_display.txt
